description: DARMA/detector => Minimal C++ detection idiom. detector is a small library that implements static/compile-time type introspection in C++. With this code, we can check if a type has methods, type aliases, or members that are exactly matching or convertible to a particular interface. Because this library requires C++-14, it is separated from the other DARMA/* libraries.
name: DARMA-tasking/detector
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
